website_summaries.verdict: Heavy pac boots – an excellent choice if you're looking for something made to handle extreme temperatures and snow.
pros: Pac boot style fits loosely so feet stay warm
Insulation leaves room for extra socks and foot movement
cons: Upper portion doesn't flex much, which some find uncomfortable

website_summaries.verdict: Great looking winter boots with a solid build that makes them a top pick. These pack boots are meant for tough winter weather.
pros: Heavy insulation makes these great for extreme winter weather
High-quality materials and heavy duty build
cons: You may need to order a size larger to make room for thick winter socks
They look bigger than regular winter boots because of extra insulation

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money on looks
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very cute and pretty warm but they are terribly uncomfortable. I wore them this morning in 23 degree weather—my toes weren’t frozen but they are slightly numb. I want to love them but in actuality, I hate them. The backs rub into the back of my ankle. They’re also so wide that I find them hard to wear while driving. I would return them but I bought them at the end of last season and had no idea how awful they were. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ash25

customer_reviews.title: Returned. Nice style but boot damaged & I wait 10+ days for refund..
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars since these arrived damaged and I have to wait 10+ days for a refund. These look like warm winter boots. This pair arrived with a dark stain on the side of one boot. About 4" of the suede nap was roughed up and discolored around the center of this spot. Obviously, someone tried to remove the stain and made a mess. The Sorel box had a split in the top, the sticky label was stuck to tissue paper and cardboard shapers were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashes

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots as a Christmas gift for my wife. Gave them to her last night and the button at the top of the boot wasn't even attached. She's been raving about these boots for the last 6 months and for her to receive them like this was a huge disappointment. Fit was perfect and she loved the boots besides the detached button. I'm hoping you'll do some sort of refund or at least send boots that are not damaged!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: In love with EVERYTHING about these boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these boots!! They look and fit exactly as I was hoping they would and I have no doubt they will protect my feet in cold, snowy weather. As some other reviews have said, they are a bit clunky, but they’re a true snow boot, that’s how they should be. I ordered a size 7 because I typically wear a 6.5 or 7 depending on the brand and I wanted these to have a little room for thick socks... There is no comparison to Sorel for snow boots; they are the BEST!!
customer_reviews.author: Nic0418

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome. Very warm and the fit is great for me. They are a little snug in the area where the ankle bends making it a bit of a challenge to pull on but even more so to take off after your feet have swelled a little. But I have always been able to get them off. Having them be more flexible in that area would be helpful for driving and walking around. But if this doesn’t bother you and you are more about the warmth and function in cold weather and snow then I highly recommend these. They are also a great look. I bought the black and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Binning

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional but needs doctoring
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair because: 1) the first pair had to go back for warranty since the sole started disconnecting 2) the second pair had a heel/sole issue and just went in 3) the third pair......one snap failed the 2nd time I put it on so I went ahead and had a local shoe repair place replace all of the snaps I want to love these boots so much. They are so cute! I added a felt/wool insert to keep my feet warmer. I live in a really wintery place, so I really put my footwear to the test. Lol!
customer_reviews.author: R. Glick

customer_reviews.title: Broken and already worn
customer_reviews.text: I want to love these boots. They fit great and seem like they would be super warm. The box was beat up when it arrived, but I didn’t take that as a sign of problems until I got the boots out. After trying them on, I’m pretty sure I received returned boots. The inside buckles are broken on both boots, the fur is super matted down and there are burrs in the fur of the left boot. At least 6-8 little burrs in the fur. Needless to say, I’m returning them and buying in store.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Dorth

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, super warm!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome. Super cute, super warm and comfortable. The only “con” is they are difficult to get on and off (as some other reviewers have mentioned) but it doesn’t warrant removing a star! This is the nature of the boot. I wouldn’t want to compromise my ability to draw them snug to my leg by having a zipper rather than functional laces. It only takes a minute to loosen the laces, get your foot in there and tighten them back up again. I LOVE these boots! I ordered my regular size. I can wear two pair of standard-weight socks and the fit is great.
customer_reviews.author: 53Fashion

customer_reviews.title: Minnesota LOVE LOVE LOVES THESE!
customer_reviews.text: These boots have been worth every single penny! I live in MN and have had them for 3 years now and they are STILL my go to. While I have been out with them I have received many many compliments along with getting frustrated with some friends who NOW have the same boots as me. ;) I will forever be a Sorel customer if they keep their products to this standard.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Poor design. Not functional/practical.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are nothing like my old (Tifino ?) Sorels. They’re super wide. I’m a 9 but ordered a 9.5. It’s like too much material around ankle area. They feel well made and sturdy. Sure they’d last many years but not practical. When trying on the 1st time, the side tip straps to pull boot on with, unsnapped. Why are they snaps???? I need them to b attached so I can pull boot on!!! Also, when I pulled my foot out, the whole inner boot thing came out! Not sure why they made a detachable inner sock thing? Too complicated. Not functional. Look too bulky and manly. Sadly returning. Will try Tofinos next.
customer_reviews.author: GenZing

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Such a great fashionable warm boot. Looks great and keeps me warm. Fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SANDL

customer_reviews.title: Cute but nothing else
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because we were having a pretty white winter and were also planning a trip to alaska. I was very disappointed that i purchased my normal size after reading reviews and finding out that they were a bit snug. I was also disappointed at how cold my feet got and how hard these boots were to get on and off. What really set me over was how much i paid and the straps broke off and the fur started looking knotted very quickly. In all these are a cute boot but that is all they were for me and that didnt last so i sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Esparza

customer_reviews.title: Warm, durable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had these very long but I love them already! I ordered my regular size (8) and they fit perfectly! They are made really well. Durable and warm. They fit fine with regular or thick wool socks. I bought these to walk my dog in through the cold months. I walked twice as far yesterday just because I wasn’t cold at all. It feels like they get warmer the longer you wear them. Very happy with my purchase. Besides being very warm and durable, they are also super cute! Do yourself a favor and invest in these high quality boots.
customer_reviews.author: eriKa

customer_reviews.title: Snowboots
customer_reviews.text: Lovely boots. Might have worked but was just a bit concerned that they were too small. I wear a size 9 in everything. So ordered a size 9. With regular thin socks that felt snug, and questionable. With thick winter socks they were too short. I was told later that the liner would wear down a bit and fit, but by that time I had already sent them back. Beautiful boots! Certainly wish they had worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Libertylover

customer_reviews.title: Sorel Women's Joan Of Arctic Boot 7.5
customer_reviews.text: OMGosh I ♥♥♥ these boots! I am involved with a lot of wet mud in the spring and these will do the trick! Plus I am sure they will keep me warm in the snow. Note: I will have to add foot soles for a more customized snug fit, and I will probably trim off as much of the fake fur as I can because I did not get these for 'looks' and would like them to fit under my pant legs without being bulky. But, these are a serious set of boots and I love them to death!
customer_reviews.author: blue

customer_reviews.title: So in love!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! Yes they are a big boot, however I bought to other cheaper pairs and the didn't fit right and I returned them sorel boots are awesome! True to size I'm a ten and they fit perfect nice and warm in this cold weather! I'm happy I spent the extra money! One thing to look out for is when taking them off do it by hand not by pulling down with other boot that will ruin them. Pardon the pjs in the pictures :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot but not for my wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: These boots were nice but unfortunately I have bunions on both feet in different areas and if I'm walking in snow for long periods of time, it wouldn't work for me. Sorel's are known for being one of the best snow boots but I was afraid it may be too narrow for my wide feet. I live in a hot climate so I'm also in flip flops all summer and my feet are probably wider now.
customer_reviews.author: Crzy4shoes

customer_reviews.title: Warm  but rubs on Achilles tendon on one foot.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very cute, and are very warm, however, I wore them twice now, and both times I was snowshoeing, the 2nd time, my Achilles got very sore because the boot was rubbing on it the whole time I was snowshoeing... only on one side, had to change to my older boots to finish my snowshoeing.. this was after a half hour. Kinda disappointed.. hoping it will get better, as I doubt I can return them after using.
customer_reviews.author: foxysimba

customer_reviews.title: CUTE BOOTS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I agree with others who say that they fit differently than 'fashion' boots. They are designed to be worn with winter weight socks. I live in Germany and use them for walking my dog in the cold weather and apres ski during our ski trips. They are warm, waterproof and cute. Makes me feel like a kid again with chunky cute snow boots!! I wear them with skirts and long socks that I scrunch down- I love the way they look with my long socks!!
customer_reviews.author: June P.

customer_reviews.title: Sorel boots
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted these for part of her Christmas gift. I found these in the Cattail (dark brown) color. I had them sent to her because I was not sure of the Holiday return policy and the price was affordable. They arrived within a couple of days and they fit perfectly in her normal 7.5 size..She loves them!!!.She has had a few opportunities to wear them because we have had a few winter storms already this year!!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen maggipinto

customer_reviews.title: Warm. Comfortable. Waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I have Morton's Neuroma, which is a pinched nerve between my third and fourth toe. This makes finding shoes that fit comfortably very difficult. The shoes must have enough room for my toes, a firm enough shoe bed to protect it from the ground, but a soft enough shoe bed that it doesn't aggravate my neuroma, and adequate protection from the cold ground. This shoe provides all of that. In these boots I am able to navigate the freezing cold cobblestone streets of Europe in warmth and comfort ALL DAY. I highly recommend them. As a side note, I have had plantar fasciitis and these boots do not aggravate it at all.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dryden

customer_reviews.title: like all Sorels I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish boots; get a lot compliments on them. These are incredibly warm and so far, have held up well in all the snow. The only reason they don’t get 5 stars is because they’re sort of hard to get on and off. The sides have tabs, which would be more helpful for pulling them on if they weren’t snaps that came undone when pulled on. They, like all Sorels I’ve ever had, are super heavy. It’s hard to drive in them.
customer_reviews.author: vmz21

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Foot Protection against New England Winters
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as a gift for a family member. She picked them out and I admit that I did not like the style from the picture; however, these boots are incredibly well-made and designed for warmth, traction and durability. Sound investment for her protection and happiness. She's delighted with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Whiting

customer_reviews.title: And they are still super tight to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: I am mostly size 6.5-7. Even in my snowboarding boots I am a 7. I had to return the 7s and get 7.5, And they are still super tight to get on and off. I do not have wide or "fat" feet either. Once the they are on they are great. I have not worn them more than a few minutes so they are not broken in. If I went up more than 7.5 they would be easier to put on and off BUT I know theyd be too big once actually on. Other than being a pain in the ass to get on and off, I LOVE them. Style, warmth and material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots - fit slightly large, comfy
customer_reviews.text: These boots are fantastic. They felt a *tiny* bit narrow at first then within an hour of clomping around, they were perfect. They are perfect snow boots - expect to have to loosen them all the way down in order to get them on, then tighten laces. They aren’t small, as some people have said. If anything, they are a bit larger than my typical 9.5. But this is perfect with thick wool socks. I walked a few miles in a snowstorm - drifts up to the top of these boots, and my feet amd legs stayed dry and warm. I recommend these boots!
customer_reviews.author: GoodBuy

customer_reviews.title: Warm, Stylish and Great Quality - But a bit snug
customer_reviews.text: They're very cute boots, but not as comfortable as I'd expect from Sorel. I catch myself wearing my generic boots a lot more over these, which is disappointing. These are just a bit snug. Just slightly. The quality is great, the warmth is fantastic, but the comfort is just so-so. I'm just not crazy about them, but in a terrible snowstorm or in any situation where I need a solid boot for warmth and to stay dry, I'm going to go with these first because I know these are going to protect my feet the best.
customer_reviews.author: SW2018

customer_reviews.title: Love ♡
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore these. Comfy, very warm, waterproof, cute. Absolutely love them. Worth the cost, since Sorels last a long time. The foot is a little wide, to increase traction, so don't expect a slim-footed boot. I am usually a 7.5/8... Opted for an 8 since they are snowboots. They are a smidgen on the big side, but I expect with thick socks they'll be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JayPhabes

customer_reviews.title: Not Warm Enough
customer_reviews.text: The boots are made well, also attractive, and the height of the boot is great for relatively deep snow. However, if you are out in the snow for over an hour, your feet will get cold. I had to buy some electric socks to help with this since I did not want to get frostbite.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaP&B

customer_reviews.title: Love these! True to size
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find these boots on Amazon. I ordered the Shale color and they only had 1 in that color, in my size. I ordered the size I wear in all shoes, but was a little worried after reading so many reviews about ordering a 1/2 size bigger, etc. Mine fit perfect!!! I was so excited. I tried them with a regular wool sock, and still could go with a thicker sock. My advice is order the size you'd normally wear. I have not had a chance to wear in the cold/wet, or snow yet.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These boots suck. You'd think for the price they'd be waterproof and last more than a year. My feet are wet after wearing them for half a day. The liners always pull out, no matter how much i loosen the laces. The clips on the sides had the rivets pop off and just dangle on the side now. Don't waste your time or money. Regardless of how cute you think they are, wet feet ain't cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm!
customer_reviews.text: Bulkier than I prefer, but I get so many compliments on these boots. I usually wear and 8-9, I ordered an 8 in these, they were snug at first but quickly became comfortable. The liner is very thick so only a thin sock is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful warm boots!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots and ordered a size 10US (i am a 39-40 EU) and took a slightly larger size as recommended by everyone because you will need thick socks to wear and be comfortable. We were in the Arctic Circle in -18 degrees Celsius and the boots and socks left me nice and toasty. (I Hate cold feet!) the color is a deep brown mahogany color with a gray fur at the top. NOTE: I wore these through security in the airport and got stopped because of the gold clasps and laces, if you hate lacing up and taking time in the airport i would recommend a different style boot.
customer_reviews.author: Obaydi

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great price on these compared to the stores in Park City! I love these boots. I have a wider foot and the wide toe box is perfect. Very comfortable to walk in all day. These were the only shoes I took on a recent trip to Park City and they were perfect for walking around town. Very cute and stylish and look great with skinny jeans tucked into them. I read other reviews that mentioned the back of the boot hitting wrong on their ankle.i felt that for maybe the first hour I wore them and then they were super comfortable. Warm and cozy and great looking!
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN

customer_reviews.title: Warm boots but run small
customer_reviews.text: I had to order these in 3 different sizes before I finally got the right fit. I’m normally an 8.5 and I went up to 9.5 in order for them to be comfortable. Very warm! I walked through 16 inches of snow after a blizzard, and the only cold I felt was when a little snow got over the top of the boot!
customer_reviews.author: D. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great for MN Winters
customer_reviews.text: I always order Sorel boots a half size up. I wear a 9.5 US and a 10 fits well with my smart wool socks. I left only 4 stars because one of the rivets on the top/side broke. It's where it makes a loop around the fur on top, came apart on the second day I wore them. They do have a one year warranty though. Will update after I go through the process.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Problem with this boot
customer_reviews.text: Previous reviews on this boot listed a problem with fit. Unfortunately they are not constructed properly. The liner and the boot were not sewn in a straight line. I was unable to get my foot in the boot with the liner inserted and also without the liner. I missed the date to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A. Luedke

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8 1/2 in a western boot. I ordered these 1 size larger because when I tried the 9, it was a bit tight. I wanted to allow for socks in the winter. Now I'm happy. Love the quality. Love the warmth. Love the waterproof quality. Love the height so snow can't easily get in. I just opened the box and the next night we had a bad snow. The best winter boots I've ever had! Beside that they look great for a real outdoor snow work boot!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie8007

customer_reviews.title: ORDER AT LEAST A FULL SIZE LARGER THAN YOU NEED
customer_reviews.text: These boots were beautiful the pics do not show that they are a rich brown color and are very classy. I would have loved to keep them but they were just too tight. Several of the reviews suggested ordering half to one size larger and I think I would need 1 to 1.5 sizes up to fit my feet with sock room. They are truly a beautiful boot that seems to be made very well .
customer_reviews.author: SHERI GOODRICH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boots!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for work. I am outside a 2 to 3 times a week for 1 1/2- 2 hours at least . I really like these boots a lot they keep my feet nice and warm even in the frigid temperatures of ND. Like every pair of boots it helps to wear a nice pair of warm socks. I love these boots and use them for every day use. I highly suggest them!
customer_reviews.author: macky joy

customer_reviews.title: Great Winter Boots!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had snow yet so I haven't had a chance to try them out in it but they fit really well and are really light for winter boots. I haven't worn thick socks with them yet and they felt a little snug, but I'm assuming that once they get some use they'll loosen up a little bit and thick socks will fit just right :) I really like the colors of the boots and how well constructed they are. I also found the name of the boot really clever! I ordered from this brand because my mom has had a pair for a very long time and they still work very well for her.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boot but no traction!
customer_reviews.text: When walking in the snow they are fine, but do NOT try walking on an icy sidewalk or parking lot they are dangerous! They are warm, they look great but are very chunky and heavy, most importantly they are slick and have no traction.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hubenak

customer_reviews.title: Sorel Women’s Boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought the boots for my NYC trip thinking it was going to be freezing cold. It wasn’t too cold but it rained most of the time I was there. The boots were very warm and definitely kept my feet dry. The only issue I have is I have to almost completely untie them to get my foot in. The top of the foot area seems a little to narrow.
customer_reviews.author: LisaL

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my honeymoon trip to Ireland (we went in their wetter season). These boots were the best purchase and the real MVPs of the trip! They fit snug (worn with wool socks) and the inside sleeve was removalable so I could remove them to dry after them getting slightly sweat damp from wearing for a full day of trudging around the Irish coasts, hills, fields in the mud and rain and grass and streams.
customer_reviews.author: aylagene

customer_reviews.title: If these are the boots you've been eyeing, go with it! Great price
customer_reviews.text: if you are between 2 sizes order up half a size otherwise stick to your regular size. They are correctly sized in my experience. I was nervous because of many negative reviews and ordered up a size. I will keep them but they are a tad big. With heavy socks they should be fine Very cute, great for snow. Haven't hiked around in them yet but they are comfortable wearing around the house. Tread is great and they do not seem too heavy. They are a bulky snow boot but not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: debra stasio

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SOREL BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: These Sorel Joan of Artic Boots arrived 1 Day EARLIER than Delivery Date... Perfect!!! We are expecting our first Nor Ester Tomorrow... I have always pined over these boots.... The construction is impeccable and the warmth is top notch. I saw them in my Ski Catalogue. The fit is perfect.... Thank you Amazon for the Speady Delivery and Amazing Customer Service Prior to this Order...
customer_reviews.author: Glitterkitty2

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable to wear!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted these boots so ordered them when the price was right. Only had them for a week so far but was out with grandkids for an hour in 20 degree weather and no cold feet. Co workers have had them for years and theirs still look new. So far love them. Well made, good traction and am looking forward to having them for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Didn't make it through half a season
customer_reviews.text: I have had Sorel boots in the past, loved them they lasted me 10+ years. These boots are much too big and I have only had them for 3 months and haven't used them mainly to go to and from work etc nothing that would wear them quickly and the sole is cracked and leaking water. Every time I step you can hear water squish in and out. I guess since Columbia purchased the brand the quality went down but the price is still extremely high.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for Upper Midwest Winter!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 8.5, but bought an 8 after reading the comments to size down a half size. I have a little room between my big toe and the end of the boot, so I'm glad I sized down. The boots do feel heavy when walking, which is my only complaint. I wish they were a little lighter. They fit nicely on my calves, so they don't look bulky like some other boots do. Boots are super warm! Perfect for upper Midwest winters! My toes usually freeze in boots, so I'm glad I decided to spend a little more money to get warm boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots they are exactly what I was hoping ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots they are exactly what I was hoping for. I own other boots in this brand and they are a half a size bigger and are slightly sloppy on me so I went down one half size when ordering these. They are a bit stiff when you first start wearing them but they softened and stretched out After just a day or so. Great quality highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Corrine Helgeson

customer_reviews.title: Warm and sharp looking!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are extremely warm but a little heavy to walk in! I would not recommend them for long walks or snow shoeing. They are great for hockey games or being a spectator in the cold!
customer_reviews.author: Christine M Vetrano

customer_reviews.title: Great looking snow boot, comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: I had an old pair of Sorel snow boots that lasted at least 12 years. I was surprised at how nice looking these boots are! I was mainly interested in comfort and warmth and Sorel doesn't disappoint. But now not only am I comfortable and warm when I'm out in the winter snow, I actually look fashionable!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Comfortable Boot
customer_reviews.text: The leg is a little stiff but I think it will get better over time. Love the fit and the feel. It's a substantial boot that doesn't feel like you are wearing a tank. Expect my feet to stay nice & warm and dry. Love the style, the fit and the look.
customer_reviews.author: Jo W.

customer_reviews.title: Soooooo warm.
customer_reviews.text: So these are great. Wonderful. Amazing. Heavy..... I sent them back. I really need a pair of boots for running around in MN slush, and a pair of hard core Sorel's for heavy duty warmth. I just cant a Ford both at the moment and the Sorels were too heavy for every day use. Love tho!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They fit great, I have wide calves, they are adjustable so I just tied them looser so they can easily slip on and off. I saw a lot of people complaining about the weight, I don’t find them heavy at all, they’re boots, they’re going to have some weight!
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Just what is needed for cold snowy northeast winters. I have been looking to buy Sorrel boots for myself for years and finally took the plunge. I am glad that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S. Grambling

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots on Planet Earth
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of Sorels. My first lasted four years and counting, but it was time for an upgrade. The green on this pair is even better in person...more of an army green than what looks mossy in the stock photo. I'm a size 8 and ordered an 8. The fit couldn't be better. Overall, they absolutely live up to the Sorel name!
customer_reviews.author: JRowe

customer_reviews.title: Feel awful on your feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Sorel's because my friend said they were great. Well, I broke them out today first snow day and they kill my feet. If you have high arches DO NOT BUY THESE without trying on first. These boots make my shins hurt because they feel so bad on my feet. They are cute if you don't have to walk in them. Can't return because I missed the window date. sucks! Buyer beware. These are NOT comfortable boots!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for winter.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. She loves them. They keep her feet warm and dry. I initially bought up half a size based on other reviews but had to return them for the exact size.
customer_reviews.author: gs

customer_reviews.title: Don't pull on leather loops!
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. Unfortunately, the loops at the top are deceiving in that they look like pull tabs to help get the boot on. In fact they are not but rather have snaps which hold the liner in place. Pulling on those leather loops resulted in popping out the snap. The rest of the boot seems very sturdy and is very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, there are my favorite winter boots that I've ever owned. These boots are wonderful for snow, slush, and even cold, rainy days because they keep my feet warm and dry. I love that the tongue of the boots are attached at the sides so you don't have to worry about snow and water getting inside. The laces make them adjustable so you can get just the fit you need. I would highly recommend these Sorel Joan of Arctic boots.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: These are super cute for a boot that is meant to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute for a boot that is meant to keep you feet warm. It was -4 degrees today and my feet stay as warm as could be expected in these extremes. I was only outdoors briefly but didn't find anything to complain about. I have used them on warmer days to shovel and do outside chores and my feet have stayed warm. The are very roomy as boots should be in order to keep you feet warm. I normally wear a 7.5 or 8 and the 7.5 I ordered are roomy I may have been fine with. 7 but tight boots ='s cold feet.
customer_reviews.author: Marine Mom

customer_reviews.title: No matter how trendy these boots are not for narrow, small feet.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 6.5, which I ordered. I exchanged them for a size 7. They are still too short, but also too wide in the toe box. This makes no sense. They are also very heavy. Would not be comforttable to wear around for any length of time. I do love the way they look, which is why so many people buy them, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: S. Herbert

customer_reviews.title: The Good and the Bad
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8.5 in regular shoes. I ordered an 8.5 in the boot and one foot is slightly too tight and the other is a perfect fit. They are a bit difficult to get into (tight around the ankle area). The tread is a bit smooth, that walking uphill/downhill on ice can become slippery and you may not get a good grip. BUT, I absolutely LOVE these boots!! They are warm and perfect for New England winters. I am so glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Appel

customer_reviews.title: Sorel + MN Winters = Winner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my regular shoe size and when they arrived I thought they'd be way too big, but they fit great and there's enough room in the toes that I can wear my Toe Warmers or double my socks. For once my toes were the warmest part of my body in these frigid MN days. So disappointed in myself for not buying them sooner, I LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: A little bulky, but over all I like these boots.
customer_reviews.text: The foot part is very comfortable. My only complaint is that they do move around (they are not fashion boots...these are winter boots) so with the height, they tend to pull down your socks when you walk. My solution was to wear tall socks and put them over my jeans when I tuck them in. That works, socks stay up. I think my favorite part of these boots was how warm your calf stays in them. I recommend these....wish they were a bit cheaper, though I think I over paid a little since I purchased them in March when boots were very difficult to find.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Go up that half size, probably.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7.5, I'm very glad I went with a size 8. If you want to wear warm wicking socks, I recommend going at least a half size up. They are rigid (not their fault, just need some breaking in), which also makes me glad I sized up. They are exactly as described, and my feet are excited.
customer_reviews.author: Smidge

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gotten numerous compliments on how cute they are! But the main feature is that they are so warm. Just make sure to order them a half size to a full size larger than what you usually wear. They did not rub on my heal at all and I ordered a 10.5. I usually wear 9.5 or a 10. I’d order them all over again!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Jorgensen-Peters

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Warm, Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love. This is my second pair of Sorel boots. This pair is more stylish then my first pair which I bought over fifteen years ago and still wear. I live in the Midwest and purchased these boots for warmth and deeper snow falls. I use arch supports, so having the boots run a bit wide helps. Also you want to be able to wear thick socks. I wouldn't wear them indoors all day because they are so warm. I highly recommend these boots. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Maeve Savich

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots - great for winter!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a long time to buy these boots because I lived in LA and couldn't justify them then I moved to the Midwest! These boots are perfect for winter and I love them! They are warm, comfortable and stylish! I took the advice of another reviewer and brought a half size up - I am a size 7.5 and got the 8 which is a perfect fit with wool socks. My only complaint is there's no arch support and the sole is very flat so I added an insole and the boots are perfect now. If you have been debating about buying these boots, just buy them already!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas present for myself. Unfortunately, this winter has turned out to be VERY mild so I haven't worn them much yet. So far they are very comfortable, well made, and go nicely with leggings or a skirt and tights. These aren't my first pair of Sorels and I am looking forward to having them for years to come. Much more stylish and more supportive than Uggs plus these boots are waterproof. I saw them on the Anthropologie web site so maybe that means they're even trendy!
customer_reviews.author: IveGotSomethingToSay

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They are heavy at first but as they get broken in they are much easier to walk in! They look so cute with a casual outfit but are still functional as a great winter boot! I wear a size 7 and ordered a size 7 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JLL

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable boot I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Well made, comfortable- Essentially was looking for a warm hiking boot that was high to walk dogs in the snow- these are perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Boots!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful boots!! I took them primitive camping in 30° weather with some friends and as long as the rest of my body was properly insulated they kept my feet at a nice warm temperature. Took them for a fair amount of walking and they kept my feet very comfortable. Held up through the mud very nicely, but I did not take them into any snow. They look beautiful, to me even better then the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE! my snow boots.. Went on an overnight winter mountaineering trip and these bad boys kept my feet nice and dry the entire time! Honestly one of the best investments I have ever made!
customer_reviews.author: Melyzah

customer_reviews.title: They fit fine, I have plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: wore them for a long walk, not in snow to test them out. Was wearing tights, because I expect to be using these for commuting back and forth to work when the weather is sloppy. They fit fine, I have plenty of room, but they did rub my heel. I think if I was wearing socks they will be fine. I am very happy with the fit. They fit as I expected a pair of snow boots to fit. Which is not the fit I expect from riding boots, or some other fashion every day wear type boot. Very cute also.
customer_reviews.author: John N

customer_reviews.title: Joan of Arctic Boots
customer_reviews.text: I expected the boots to be really big and sloppy from all that I have heard from other people. They do seem quite wide and roomy but they seem short in length. Need to try them with bulky winter socks to make sure they will not be too tight on my toes. Love the style and from just wearing them around the house, do not have any rub areas or pinch points. They are definitely heavy boots to wear around. Wont feel much lighter than wearing ski boots... Want to give a 5 star but need to wear around for an entire day and see what my feet feel like afterward.
customer_reviews.author: MLA

customer_reviews.title: Really nice boot
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these boots and they fit her well. The only complaint is one of the snaps at the top of the boot broke the first time she removed the tab. It doesn't affect the boot functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything I ever wanted in a boot
customer_reviews.text: A little tough to get your foot in without loosening laces all the way down. The quality is great and they keep the feet nice and warm. Comfortable enough to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Keep warm and for perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes bough this shoe as a gift for my wife and she loves it. Fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ZHAO

customer_reviews.title: Best boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: The best boots ever. I did feel they were a bit hard to get on, but the fit is great! I wore thicker socks, and still felt comfortable. Got many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn W

customer_reviews.title: A Great Winter Investment
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these every Winter since I bought them and I still love them. They just get more comfortable and I still love the way they look and they keep the snow off of my feet and legs which is the most important part. These were a great investment. They will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Like layers of skin off
customer_reviews.text: This boot fit my foot and is certainly warm and waterproof. For that it gets 2 stars. HOWEVER - it TORE up the back of my ankle bloody. Like layers of skin off, weeks to heal bloody. I know people say you have to "break them in" but I seriously was not expecting open gushing wounds.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: WARM!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so comfy and so warm! I could not be happier with the product! The only thing not sure what or how, but my left boot lets out this squeaky noise everytime I walk which is kind of annoying but I think they missed glue somewhere, and air is letting out everytime I walk. I will have to investigate that a bit further.
customer_reviews.author: ERIKA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and cute.. runs small.
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars review.. only because they run small. I wish that I took the advice of other reviewers. I normally wear a 9.. in Asics, nikes, bear paws and uggs etc. If I were you get a 9 1/2. Your toes will be tight with thin socks otherwise. I'm too lazy to send them back. Perhaps I'll gift them to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, a little hard to get on though
customer_reviews.text: The leather upper at the bottom, where the laces end is very tight and make it somewhat difficult to get your foot into the boot without a bit of work. I feel like this is something that will be alleviated over time as the leather wears in but initially it make them somewhat hard to get on. Once on the boot fits as it should for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very warm. I wore them in the house and I had to take them off because they were so hot. I have not worn them outside yet to test the elements, but they are waterproof, they are very comfortable. My only reason for not giving them 5 stars is that they fit a little small for a size 8. Once you put on socks, they will be a little tight. I am hoping they will be warm enough without a pair of wool socks. They definitely are stylish and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I was putting them on with thicker socks. It was very difficult. But I did wear them with thinner socks and hiked through the snow for 2 hours and had no issues. Feet were warm and dry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking boots
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks. They are as good as pictured. The one thing I don’t like is how hard they are to get in. I have to unlace a long ways down to be able to put them on and then relace all the way back up. Not fun in a hurry!
customer_reviews.author: M. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I bought a half size bigger than my normal shoe size to accommodate good heavy socks. They fit just as expected. They are a bit heavier than I am used to but shouldn't have any trouble getting used to them. I have already tested them out in some pretty deep snow and water and had no leaks. Wore them the first time with only tights and they were nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: Let it snow!
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait for cold weather (sort of!) so I can wear them again. They are very comfortable and I love the look especially with jeans or leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Cute but huge
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots to make it through our cold, wet winters. They are so cute! I love the fur lining around the top, but the top of the tongue sits about an inch below the top, so I think snow would end up inside the boots. I wear a size 8 1/2 and purchased a 9. They are too wide and too long for my feet, even with thick socks on. They were rubbing my ankle. I wish they came in half sizes, as the size 8 was way too small. I returned them and bought the Sorel Tofino boots in a 9 and they fit me just right.
customer_reviews.author: Krista A.

customer_reviews.title: A bit snug, but very warm and well made
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and look adorable. I wore in below zero temps and my feet stayed warm. I wish I would have purchased a half size bigger so they could slide on easier.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Miller

customer_reviews.title: It's like your feet stayed warm at home even when you're outside
customer_reviews.text: While not a great choice for extended walking, these boots kept my feet warm in 10 degree weather for up to 3 hours. They are a great choice for harsh winter climates with their warm fur lining and defined tread. They won't keep you from slipping on ice so you may need to purchase additional ice cleats but pair them with some warm socks and your feet feel as though they stayed inside your warm comfortable house while the rest of you went outside into the cold.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Not a single regret
customer_reviews.text: Best winter purchase I’ve made. I live in the Midwest where the snow and cold can get pretty brutal. These have been wonderful for when I take my dog for a walk outside in the non shoveled snow anywhere from 5-30 minutes. I would 100% recommend these. I’m a true 7.5 and usually 8 in boots. I bought these in a size 7.5. They are a little snug and I have to definitely wiggle my way into the boot with a thin sock on. However, overtime it’s gotten a lot easier to put on with wear.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Mama

customer_reviews.title: Love love
customer_reviews.text: These boots are the most amazing thing ever. I looked everywhere , in stores and online, for these boots and Amazon was the only place that had the correct size and color. The fit is perfect and gives me a little extra room for thicker socks which is perfect. They also keep your feet nice and toasty and dry. If you are looking for a rain and snow boot in one, Sorel boots is the only way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bad liner snaps.
customer_reviews.text: Sorels have always been great, tough boots. I love these boots. I purchased early January 2019. yesterday, only on one boot, the snaps broke. I didn't use undue force, and the other boot snaps are fine. bad luck I guess, but am still disappointed that a usually high quality boot used bad snaps. otherwise 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Willson Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Did not get feet  wet
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots . I wore a friends size 9 and fit but I like them a little loose so I ordered a 9 1/2 and love the fit. U can wear a thicker sock with a bit more room. They did not get wet in slushy and snow weather either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: maybe I got fake ones
customer_reviews.text: The pair I got did not come with the original packing nor any tag. Not sure if these are fake.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cute but very difficult to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: These boots are warm, stylish and comfortable in cold weather. The fit is comfortable once they are on but even with the time consuming task of unlacing the laces completely they are very challenging to get on and off. I was hoping they would stretch out but wearing them several hours on three occasions has not helped.
customer_reviews.author: carol chrisekos

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Received these boots earlier than expected. They fits true to size and look great. The price point was very good and I love the color Cattail as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dlewis95

product_meta.title: Sorel Women's Joan Of Arctic Boot
product_meta.description:
Founded in 1962 in canada, Sorel brings its functionality and heritage of expert craftsmanship to the modern world of fashion, where it is inspiring a new generation of doers, builder, and creators. AND though Sorel makes more than just boots, theres a boot in everything Sorel makes. Sorel combines felt, wool, premium leather, and flawless construction with people who aren’t afraid to get their boots dirty. To measure your foot, place your feet flat on a piece of paper and mark your longest toe and the back of your foot. It is best to do this standing and wearing socks. Measure the length straight from your longest toe to the back of your foot using a ruler or measuring tape. Use the chart to find your size

Sorel's cold weather footwear is ideal for those participating in active winter sports like snowmobiling or sledding, or for activities where maximum protection is required -- like all-season hunting or fishing, or simply going to work.
feature_bullets: READY FOR WINTER: A serious snow boot with serious style; Chic lace-up style with faux fur cuff perfect for your winter wardrobe
WATERPROOF BOOT: Made with waterproof suede and features a seam-sealed waterproof construction; Keeps your feet happy, dry and protected in any weather
ALL-DAY WARMTH AND COMFORT: Features a removable 6 mm washable recycled felt inner boot for extra warmth; 2.5 mm bonded felt frost plug in the midsole provides extra insulation
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Handcrafted waterproof vulcanized rubber shell with herringbone outsole provides extra grip that keeps your feet on the ground
FUNCTION MEETS FASHION: SOREL creates bold, always-ready footwear that's built to take on non-stop days and nights in the city
